page.title: 18NORTH BRENT -EVRYDAY THINGS
page.content: {The Refrigerator }This keeps things cold. The outside is metal and it plugs into the electricity. There is a thermostat which makes sure the temperature stays low. It is for keeping food fresh and drinks, e.g. milk. The inside has shelves and is plastic. {The Vacuum cleaner }works by electricity. It is a machine that has a hose attached to it. At the end of the hose is a brush. There is a bag inside. When it is switched on it sucks up the dirt and dust from the floors and carpets through the hose and into the bag which is often emptied. {The Washing Machine }is a metal box that uses electricity to work. There is a door at the front or top. Inside is a drum that moved around when switched on. The dirty clothes are put in and it is turned on.It fills with water and soap powder
